name: badwords
description: Will act upon anyone in a specified channel that mentions words you choose.
long_description: Will act upon anyone in a specified channel that mentions a certain word that you add to the bad words database (wildcards accepted). Such actions popular are /kick and /ban, but can do more.

user_throt.description: How long a user is ignored after using

chan_throt.description: How long all users in a channel are ignored after using

link_throt.description: How long a link will not be reposted again aftre using
